definition: lit. naked wedding/no-frills civil wedding ceremony lacking a material foundation: no car, house, reception, rings, or honeymoon

sentences.english: Such as Tong Jiaqian naked marriage, her assertion is not happy.
sentences.chinese: 像童佳倩這樣裸婚，她斷言不會幸福。

sentences.english: Naked wedding becomes the option for many youngers.
sentences.chinese: 裸婚成爲了許多年輕人的選擇。

definition: to get married soon after meeting (abbr. for 閃電結婚|闪电结婚[shan3 dian4 jie2 hun1]) (neologism c. 2005)
trial marriage/to live together before deciding whether to marry
to marry for the second time/second marriage/second spouse
marriage arranged following a pregnancy/marriage necessitated by an unplanned pregnancy
(Internet slang) guy who grew up in the countryside and gained a foothold in the city through hard work
sham marriage, esp. a marriage between a gay man and a lesbian arranged in response to parental expectations of a conventional marriage/abbr. for 形式婚姻
love between an older woman and a younger man
forced marriage/arranged marriage (without the consent of the individuals)
to marry and live with the bride's family (inverting traditional Chinese expectations)
